p: In this section, we describe: a) the historical data and indicators used when fitting the stunting model, b) the forms of the equations and the process of fitting the stunting model, and c) the poverty and food-price models and the scenario-specific projection data used to make the estimates of future stunting. For the latter, a full set of projection data was available only out to 2030, and this limited the temporal horizon of our stunting estimates.
